headline: Will Adding Cintas CEO Todd Schneider to the Board Shift PPG Industries' (PPG) Governance Priorities?
summary: PPG Industries has elected Todd M. Schneider, president and CEO of Cintas, to its board of directors effective January 14, 2026, where he will serve on the Nominating and Governance and Sustainability and Innovation committees. This board appointment introduces service-focused leadership and operational expertise from outside the chemicals sector, potentially influencing how PPG balances governance, sustainability, and growth priorities. We’ll now examine how adding Schneider’s governance...
